description_html:
Fiandre presents Marble Lab, an updated porcelain collection of classic marble, produced in Italy.
Marble Lab is a wall and floor collection of very sophisticated and rare marble varieties in polished or semi polished finishes (such as, Calacatta Statuario, Calacatta Elite, Bianco Striatto, Glam Bronze, Noble Ecru, Pietra Grey, Nero Portoro, Quarzo Greige, Taxos, and Premium White) in large format slabs with an 8 mm thickness. Marble Lab sizes include large formats in 120x60, 60x60 and 60x30 and complement the existing Fiandre Maximum range of large format 120x60 slabs.
